stencils.title: Diagram
stencils.description: A UML Activity Diagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="800"     height="600"     version="1.0">    <defs></defs>    <g pointer-events="fill" >      <polygon        stroke="black"        fill="black"        stroke-width="1"        points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0"        stroke-linecap="butt"        stroke-linejoin="miter"        stroke-miterlimit="10" />      <rect        id="diagramcanvas"         x="0"        y="0"        width="790"        height="590"        stroke="black"        stroke-width="2"        fill="white"        oryx:resize="vertical horizontal"/>            <text       id="text"       stroke="black"        font-size="22"         x="400"        y="25"        oryx:align="top center">      </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Action
stencils.description: Fundamental unit of behavior specification, which converts input to output.
stencils.description_de: Grundlegende Einheit zur Spezifikation von Verhalten mit Ein- und Ausgabe.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="60 30"       id="action">      <rect       id="actionrect"          x="0"          y="0"          width="90"          height="50"       rx="15"       ry="15"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />          <text          font-size="12"          id="text"          x="45"          y="25"         stroke="black"          oryx:align="middle center"          oryx:fittoelem="actionrect">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Activity
stencils.description: A unit which coordinates sequences and conditions of lower-level behavior
stencils.description_de: Einheit, die Sequenzen und Bedingungen niedrigerer Ebene koordiniert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>           <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="50" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="30" oryx:cy="99" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="99" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="170" oryx:cy="99" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="199" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="199" oryx:cy="50" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="199" oryx:cy="80" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="30" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="170" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="50" oryx:default="yes" />          </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="120 60"       id="activity">      <rect       id="activityrect"          x="0"          y="0"          width="200"          height="100"       rx="20"       ry="20"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />          <text          id="text"         font-size="12"          x="10"          y="10"          stroke="black"         oryx:align="top left"         oryx:anchors="top left"         oryx:fittoelem="activityrect">        </text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Accept Event
stencils.description: An action that waits for the occurrence of an event meeting specified condition
stencils.description_de: Eine Aktion, die auf Eintreten eines vorher spezifizierten Ereignisses wartet
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">  <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="60 30"       id="umleventincoming">       <polygon        id="border"     points="0,0 90,0 90,50 0,50 15,25 0,0"    stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"    oryx:resize="horizontal vertical"/>      <rect     id="text_frame"    x="20"    y="2"    width="68"    height="46"    stroke="none"       stroke-width="0"       fill="none"    oryx:anchors="top left bottom right"/>      <text    id="text"     font-size="12"      x="52"     y="25"    stroke="black"     oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="text_frame">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Send Event
stencils.description: An action that creates a signal instance which is transmitted to a target object
stencils.description_de: Aktion, die ein Signal erzeugt und zum Zielobjekt sendet
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="60 30"       id="umleventoutgoing">       <polygon        id="border"    points="0,0 75,0 90,25 75,50 0,50 0,0"    stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"    oryx:resize="horizontal vertical"/>   <rect    id="text_frame"    x="4"    y="4"    width="69"    height="42"    stroke="none"       stroke-width="0"       fill="none"    oryx:anchors="top left bottom right"/>   <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="45"     y="25"     stroke="black"    oryx:align="middle center"    oryx:fittoelem="text_frame" >   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Time Event
stencils.description: An action that creates a signal instance when time condition is fulfilled
stencils.description_de: Aktion, die ein Signal erzeugt wenn eine Zeitbedingung erfüllt ist
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="17.5" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="17.5" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="17.5" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       id="umleventtimed">       <polygon         id="border"    points="0,0 35,50 0,50 35,0 0,0"    stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"/>   <text     id="text"    font-size="12"         x="35"     y="25"    stroke="black"     oryx:align="middle left"    oryx:anchors="right">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Activity Partition
stencils.description: Partitions divide the nodes and edges to constrain and show a view of the contained nodes
stencils.description_de: Partitionen teilen Aktionen ein, um die Sicht auf diese zu verdeutlichen
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g>   <rect        id="border"      x="0"     y="0"     width="250"     height="600"    oryx:resize="vertical horizontal"    stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="none"/>     <rect     id="role"    x="0"    y="0"    width="250"    height="30"    oryx:anchors="left top right"    stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"/>     <text    id="text"    x="125"    y="13"     font-size="12"     stroke="black"    oryx:align="middle center"     oryx:anchors="top"    oryx:fittoelem="role">   </text>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Interruptable Region
stencils.description: An activity group that supports termination of tokens flowing in the portions of an activity.
stencils.description_de: Aktivitätsgruppe, die die Terminierung von Tokens in ihr ermöglicht
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="100 100"       id="umlinterruptablearea">      <rect       id="border"       x="2"       y="2"          width="200"          height="200"       rx="15"       ry="15"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"          stroke-dasharray="10, 10"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />         <text        id="text"         font-size="12"        x="17"         y="14"        stroke="black"          oryx:align="top left"        oryx:anchors="top left"        oryx:fittoelem="border">       </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Object
stencils.description: An object is part of the object flow in an activity
stencils.description_de: Ein Objekt ist ein Teil des Objektflusses in Aktivitäten
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="15" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="89" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="15" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="45" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g       oryx:minimumSize="60 30"       id="umlobject">      <rect       id="border"       x="0"       y="0"          width="90"          height="50"          fill="white"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"          oryx:resize="horizontal vertical" />          <text          font-size="12"          id="text"          x="45"          y="25"          oryx:align="middle center"          oryx:fittoelem="border"         stroke="black">        </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Note
stencils.description: Comment regarding a diagram element
stencils.description_de: Kommentar mit Bezug zu einem Modellelement oder Diagramm
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"     width="122"     height="72"     version="1.0">    <oryx:magnets>      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="35" oryx:default="yes" />    </oryx:magnets>    <g      oryx:minimumSize="50 40"      oryx:maximumSize="">      <path        id="border"       d="M120 10 L110 10 L 110 0 L120 10 L120 70 L0 70 L0 0 L110 0"        fill="white"       stroke="black"        stroke-width="2"       oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" />             <text        font-size="12"        id="text"        x="60"        y="35"        oryx:align="middle center"        stroke="black">      </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Initial Node
stencils.description: A control node at which flow starts when the activity is invoked.
stencils.description_de: Kontrollknoten, bei dem der Ablauf anfängt, wenn eine Aktivität angestoßen wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 20"       id="umlstartnode">     <circle      id="circle"      cx="10"         cy="10"         r="10"         stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"      fill="black"/>     <text   id="text"    font-size="12"    x="10"   y="-2"    stroke="black"   oryx:anchors="top"   oryx:align="bottom center">  </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Flow Final Node
stencils.description: Final node that terminates a flow
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 20"       id="umlflowfinalnode">      <circle       id="outercircle"          cx="10"          cy="10"          r="10"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"/>        <line          x1="3"          y1="3"          x2="17"          y2="17"          stroke-width="2"          stroke="black"/>        <line          x1="3"          y1="17"          x2="17"          y2="3"          stroke-width="2"          stroke="black"/>        <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="10"    y="24"     stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="bottom"    oryx:align="top center">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Activity Final Node
stencils.description: A final node that stops all flows in an activity
stencils.description_de: Endknoten, der alle Abläufe in einer Aktivität beendet
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">    <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 20"       id="umlendnode">      <circle       id="outercircle"          cx="10"          cy="10"          r="10"          stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white"/>   <circle    id="innercircle"          cx="10"          cy="10"          r="6.5"          fill="black"/>         <text    id="text"    x="10"    y="24"     font-size="12"    stroke="black"     oryx:align="top center"     oryx:anchors="bottom">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: And Fork/Join
stencils.description: A control node that splits a flow into multiple concurrent flows; A control node that synchronizes multiple flows
stencils.description_de: Kontrollknoten, der den Ablauf in mehrere parallele Abläufe aufteilt; Kontrollknoten, der mehrere parallele Abläufe zusammenführt
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">          <oryx:magnets>           <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="9" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="9" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="35" oryx:cy="9" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="35" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="5" oryx:default="yes" />          </oryx:magnets>        <g       oryx:minimumSize="20 10"       oryx:maximumSize="100 10">      <rect       x="0"       y="0"    width= "40"    height= "10"    fill="black"     oryx:resize="horizontal"/>   <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="42"    y="0"     stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="top"    oryx:align="bottom left">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: And Fork/Join
stencils.description: A control node that splits a flow into multiple concurrent flows; A control node that synchronizes multiple flows
stencils.description_de: Kontrollknoten, der den Ablauf in mehrere parallele Abläufe aufteilt; Kontrollknoten, der mehrere parallele Abläufe zusammenführt
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">          <oryx:magnets>           <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="9" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="9" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="9" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />          </oryx:magnets>        <g       oryx:minimumSize="10 20"       oryx:maximumSize="10 100">      <rect       x="0"       y="0"    width= "10"    height= "40"    fill="black"     oryx:resize="vertical"/>   <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="12"    y="0"     stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="top"    oryx:align="bottom left">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Decision/Merge
stencils.description: Control node that chooses between outgoing flows / Control node that brings together multiple alternate flows
stencils.description_de: Kontrollknoten, der einen Ablauf aus verschiedenen ausgehenden auswählt / Kontrollknoten, der mehrere alternative Abläufe zusammenführt
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">      <oryx:magnets>           <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="15" oryx:anchors="left" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="10" oryx:cy="29" oryx:anchors="bottom" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="19" oryx:cy="15" oryx:anchors="right" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="10" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />       <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="10" oryx:cy="15" oryx:default="yes" />          </oryx:magnets>    <g     id="umlor"       oryx:minimumSize="20 20">      <path       id="border"       d="M0 15 L10 0 L20 15 L10 30 L0 15 Z"        stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"       fill="white" />      <text    id="text"     font-size="12"     x="32"    y="0"     stroke="black"    oryx:anchors="top"    oryx:align="bottom left">   </text>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Annotation Edge
stencils.description: Connects a note with a model element
stencils.description_de: Verbindet eine Notiz mit einem Modellelement
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <g id="edge">   <path     d="M50 50 L100 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     stroke-dasharray="3, 4"/>   <text     id="role"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Control Flow
stencils.description: Connects actions, activities and events
Verbindet Aktionen, Aktivitäten und Ereignisse
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker     id="end"     refX="10"     refY="5"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="10"     markerHeight="10"     orient="auto">          <path       d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0"       fill="none"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"/>     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="controlflow">   <path     d="M50 50 L100 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     marker-end="url(#end)"/>   <text     id="condition"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Object Flow
stencils.description: Connects objects with actions or actions with objects
stencils.description_de: Verbindet Objekte mit Aktionen oder Aktionen mit Objekten
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker     id="end"     refX="10"     refY="5"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="10"     markerHeight="10"     orient="auto">        <path      d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0"      fill="none"      stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"/>     </marker>  </defs>  <g    id="objectflow">      <path     d="M50 50 L100 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     marker-end="url(#end)"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Object Flow With Pins
stencils.description: Connects two actions to indicate object flow
stencils.description_de: Verbindet zwei Aktionen um Objektfluss darzustellen
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>  <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">    <defs>     <marker     id="end"     refX="31"     refY="11"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="32"     markerHeight="22"     orient="auto">        <path      d="M 11 20 L 31 20 L 31 1 L11 1 L11 20 Z"      fill="white"      stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"/>         <path       d="M 0 16 L 10 11 L 0 6"       fill="none"       stroke="black"       stroke-width="2"/>        </marker>      <marker     id="begin"     refX="1"     refY="11"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="22"     markerHeight="22"     orient="auto">        <path      d="M 1 20 L 20 20 L 20 1 L1 1 L1 20 Z"      fill="white"      stroke="black"      stroke-width="2"/>           </marker>  </defs>    <g    id="edge">      <path     d="M50 50 L100 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     marker-end="url(#end)"     marker-start="url(#begin)"/>       <text     id="pinStart"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>       <text     id="name"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>           <text     id="pinEnd"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Interrupt Edge
stencils.description: Connects causing Event with any kind of action.
Verbindet auslösendes Ereignis mit Aktion
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"     xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     version="1.0">     <defs>   <marker     id="end"     refX="45"     refY="15"     markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse"     markerWidth="45"     markerHeight="20"     orient="auto">            <path        d="M 0 5 L 25 10 L 15 0 L 40 5 L 33 0 M 40 5 L 32 7"        fill="none"        stroke="black"        stroke-width="1"/>         <path        d="M 35 10 L 45 15 L 35 20"        fill="none"        stroke="black"        stroke-width="2"/>      </marker>  </defs>    <g id="interruptEdge">    <path     d="M50 50 L100 50"     stroke="black"     fill="none"     stroke-width="2"     marker-end="url(#end)"/>  <text     id="text"     x="0"     y="0"     oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>  </g> </svg>
